Title: AN ACT TO AMEND COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED THREE HUNDRED AND THIRTY ENTITLED "AN ACT APPROPRIATING NINETY-SIX MILLION THREE HUNDRED FIFTY-ONE THOUSAND AND THREE HUNDRED PESOS FOR PUBLIC WORKS."
Data:
[ Commonwealth Act No. 475, June 17, 1939 ]
AN ACT TO AMEND COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED THREE HUNDRED AND THIRTY ENTITLED "AN ACT APPROPRIATING NINETY-SIX MILLION THREE HUNDRED FIFTY-ONE THOUSAND AND THREE HUNDRED PESOS FOR PUBLIC WORKS."
Be it enacted by the National Assembly of the Philippines:
Section 1. The following items of appropriation under section one, subsection C, paragraph (r) of Commonwealth Act Numbered Three hundred and thirty are amended so as to read as follows:
x x x (Items omitted) x x x
Section 2. The following item of appropriation under section three, subsection A, paragraph (b) of Commonwealth Act Numbered Three hundred and thirty is amended so as to read as follows:

CEBU


25
Argao Cebu
P4,000.00



Section 3. Items to be known as item 26 (a) and 26 (b) under Abra ; 47(a) under Albay ; 3(a), 3(a), 3(b) and 3(c) under Bataan ; 39 (a), 40(a), 41(a), 69(a) and 77(a) under Bulacan ; 36(a) under Bohol ; 5(a) under Capiz ; 57(a) and 123(a) under Ilocos Sur; 12(a), 89(a) and 89(b) under La Union ; 22(a) and 22(b) under Mindoro ; 2(a) under Mountain Province ; 137(a) under Pangasinan ;56(a) under Sorsogon, and 32(a) under Tarlac ; are inserted in section I, subsection C, paragraph (r) of Commonwealth Act Numbered Three hundred and Thirty to read as follows:
x x x (Items omitted) x x x
Section 4. The following item of appropriation to be known as item 25(a) under Cebu is inserted in section three, subsection A, paragraph (b) of Commonwealth Act Numbered Three hundred and thirty to read as follows



25(a).
Sibonga, Cebu
11,000.00



Section 5. Items 8, 9, 14, 18, and 20 under Abra ; item 2 under Antique; item 18 under Bohol ; item 119 under Cebu ; item 127 under Ilocos Sur; items 16, 17, 18, 24, 28, 29, 52 and 92 under La Union ; items 23, 24, 25, 26, 27 and 28 under Mindoro ; items 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 26a and 71 under Mountain Province ; item 2, 9, 10, 11, 12, 15, 29, and 42, under Nueva Viscaya ; items 29 and 145 under Pangasinan ; item 18 under Romblon ; items 105 and 109, under Samar ; item 58 under Sorsogon ; item 54 under Tarlac ; are supressed: and item 58, subsection D, paragraph (y) any unexpected balance of which is to be applied to item 47a, subsection C, paragraph (r) under Albay.
Section 6. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.ℒαwρhi৷
Approved, June 17, 1939, with the exception of the following items ; Section 1 ; Antique Items 19, 21, 28, and 33 ; Bulacan, Items 40, 69 and 77 ; Nueva Ecija, Item 78 ; Nueva Viscaya, Item 56 ; Pampanga 46: Pangasinan, Items 24 and 30 ; Samar, Item 104 ; Tarlac, Item 53 ; Section 3: Bulacan, items 40(a) , 69(a) and 77(a) ; La Union, Items 12(a) and 89(a); Mindoro, Items 22(a) and 22(b) ; Pangasinan, Item 137(a).
The suppression in Section 5 of item 2 under Antique ; of Item 18 under Bohol ; of Items18, 24, 28, 29 and 92 under La Union ; of Items 23, 24, 25, 26, 27, and 28 under Mindoro ; of Items 11 and 15 under Nueva Viscaya ; of Items 29 and 145 under Pangasinan ; of Items 105 and 190 under Samar ; and of Item 54 under Tarlac, is disapproved.
